    • Field Detail

      • user

        private UserInfo user
        This class is the one carrying out all the communication with the server. The GUI components use it as a middle-man in order to retrieve or update information of the server. This class will contain the UserInfo property containing the information of the user who has logged in, and will offer it to the components of the GUI.

      • organizer

        private OrganizerInfo organizer

      • setOrganizer

      • attemptNormalLogin

        public boolean attemptNormalLogin(String email,
                                  String password)
        This method is invoked by the login button in the GUI, and it makes a login request to the server with the specified email and password. It is used only for regular users, not organizers.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the user taken from the GUI
        password - Password taken from the GUI
        Returns:
        true if the login was successful, otherwise it returns false

      • attemptNormalLoginOrganizer

        public boolean attemptNormalLoginOrganizer(String email,
                                           String password)
        * This method is invoked by the login button in the GUI, and it makes a login request to the server with the specified email and password. It is used only for organizers.
        Parameters:
        email - email of the Organizer
        password - password of the organizer
        Returns:
        true if succesful
        Since:
        Sprint 2

      • attemptNormalLogin

        public boolean attemptNormalLogin(String email,
                                  String password,
                                  boolean organizer)
        Deprecated. beeter to use attemptNormalLogin(email, password) and attemptNormalLoginOrganizer !
        This method is invoked by the login button in the GUI, and it makes a login request to the server with the specified email and password. The class of object must be indicated in the boolean input. This method works as a solution for both organizers and logins
        Parameters:
        email - email of the User or Organizer
        password - password of the of the User or Organizer
        organizer - boolean that indicates whether it's a User or Organizer
        Returns:
        boolean if succesful
        Since:
        Sprint 2

      • attemptNormalSignup

        public boolean attemptNormalSignup(String email,
                                   String password,
                                   String name,
                                   String city,
                                   ArrayList<TopicInfo> interests)
        This method is invoked by the signup button in the GUI, and makes a signup request to the server with the specified fields (email, password, name and city). It is used only for regular users, not organizers.
        Parameters:
        email - Email String taken from the GUI
        password - Password String taken from the GUI
        name - Name String taken from the GUI
        city - City String taken from the GUI
        Returns:
        true if the signup process was successful, otherwise it returns false

      • attemptOrganizerSignup

        public boolean attemptOrganizerSignup(String email,
                                      String password,
                                      String name,
                                      String organization)
        This method is invoked by the signup button in the GUI, and makes a signup request to the server with the specified fields (email, password, name and organization). It is used only for organizers.
        Parameters:
        email - Email String taken from the GUI
        password - Password String taken from the GUI
        name - Name String taken from the GUI
        organization - String
        Returns:
        true if the signup process was successful, otherwise it returns false
        Since:
        Sprint 2

      • attemptNormalUpdate

        public boolean attemptNormalUpdate()
        Updates the user stored in the Controller, in order to use this function a user must log in before.
        Returns:
        true if the process is successful
        Since:
        Sprint 2

      • attemptOrganizerUpdate

        public boolean attemptOrganizerUpdate()
        Updates the Organizer stored in the Controller, in order to use this function a Organizer must log in before.
        Returns:
        true if the process is successful
        Since:
        Sprint 2

      • attemptUserDelete

        public boolean attemptUserDelete()
        Deletes the user stored in the Controller.
        Returns:
        true if the process is successful, false if not
        Since:
        Sprint 2

      • attemptOrganizerDelete

        public boolean attemptOrganizerDelete()

      • createEvent

        public boolean createEvent(EventInfo eventInfo)
        sends EventInfo to the server, to use this method the organizer must be logged in.
        Parameters:
        eventInfo - event to be sent to the server
        Returns:
        true if succesful
        Since:
        sprint 2

      • createPost

        public boolean createPost(EventInfo eventInfo,
                          PostInfo postInfo)
        Adds a post on the indicated Event and notifies the server.
        Parameters:
        eventInfo - Event where the post is going to be held.
        postInfo - Post to be added.
        Returns:
        true if succesful
        Since:
        sprint 2
